text: Wellington E. Webb (born February 17, 1941) is an American politician. He was in the Colorado House of Representatives and was the first African American mayor of Denver, Colorado, from 1991 to 2003. ==Other websites== * Biography by DenverGov.org - Focuses mostly on Webb's service as city auditor * The Wellington E. Webb Municipal Office Building - Information and pictures * South Platte project Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Denver Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Wellington Webb
